00036 /**
00037  * \addtogroup lc
00038  * @{
00039  */
00040 
00041 /**
00042  * \file
00043  * Implementation of local continuations based on the "Labels as
00044  * values" feature of gcc
00045  * \author
00046  * Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>
00047  *
00048  * This implementation of local continuations is based on a special
00049  * feature of the GCC C compiler called "labels as values". This
00050  * feature allows assigning pointers with the address of the code
00051  * corresponding to a particular C label.
00052  *
00053  * For more information, see the GCC documentation:
00054  *
00055  * http://gcc.gnu.org/onlinedocs/gcc/Labels-as-Values.html
00056  *
00057  */
00058 
00059 #ifndef __LC_ADDRLABELS_H__
00060 #define __LC_ADDRLABELS_H__
00061 
00062 /** \hideinitializer */
00063 typedef void * lc_t;
00064 
00065 #define LC_CONCAT2(s1, s2) s1##s2
00066 #define LC_CONCAT(s1, s2) LC_CONCAT2(s1, s2)
00067 
00068 #define LC_SET(s)                               \
00069   do {                                          \
00070     LC_CONCAT(LC_LABEL, __LINE__):              \
00071     (s) = &&LC_CONCAT(LC_LABEL, __LINE__);      \
00072   } while(0)
00073 
00074 #define LC_RESUME(s)                            \
00075   do {                                          \
00076     if(s != NULL) {                             \
00077       goto *s;                                  \
00078     }                                           \
00079   } while(0)
00080 
00081 #define LC_END(s)
00082 
00083 #define LC_INIT(s) s = NULL
00084 
00085 #endif /* __LC_ADDRLABELS_H__ */
